resources.string: Class Organizer and Day Scheduler for DiU

It seems this is the first time you are using this app.
This app need an active internet connection to fetch the data for the first.
The routine is populated with the love of users like you.
If you ever create routine feel free to upload it to the cloud
Share this app to your friends for an easier routine

Click next when you are ready.
